```{r, results='asis', echo=FALSE, SGP_Object_Tests}
	require(SGP)

	eoct.tf <- any(grepl("EOCT", sgp_object@Data[YEAR==sgp.year]$GRADE))
	if (eoct.tf) {
		GL_subjects <- unique(sgp_object@Data[YEAR==sgp.year & GRADE != "EOCT", CONTENT_AREA])
		EOC_subjects <- unique(sgp_object@Data[YEAR==sgp.year & GRADE == "EOCT", CONTENT_AREA])
	} else GL_subjects <- unique(sgp_object@Data[YEAR==sgp.year, CONTENT_AREA])
```
